title: Product
description: XDM product variant, master product and key attributes of product in the product catalog.

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: The internal unique ID of the product or variant in the commerce backend system.

xdm:SKU.title: SKU
xdm:SKU.description: The unique SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the variant assigned by the vendor.

schema:description.title: Description
schema:description.description: The localized description of the product.

xdm:categories.title: Category
xdm:categories.description: List of category ids of the product/variant.

xdm:masterProductID.title: Master Product Identifier
xdm:masterProductID.description: The internal unique ID of the product in the commerce backend system.

xdm:prices.title: Prices

currency.title: Currency Code
currency.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for cost and pricing.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount value for that price.

xdm:prices.description: The prices for this product. In the `currencyCode` currency.

xdm:assets.title: Assets
xdm:assets.description: List of assets associated with this product/variant.

xdm:attributes.title: Attributes
xdm:attributes.description: List of attributes associated with this product/variant.

xdm:variants.title: Product Variants
xdm:variants.description: List of product variants belonging to this product.

xdm:productCreateDate.title: Product Creation Date
xdm:productCreateDate.description: The date when this product variant was created. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productLastModified.title: Product Last Modified
xdm:productLastModified.description: The date when this product variant was last modified. The time using RFC3339 with a stated timezone offset such as "2001-07-04T12:08:56-07:00". An example formatting pattern is "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssXXX".

xdm:productURL.title: Product URL
xdm:productURL.description: The URL for the primary Product View of the product variant page.
